entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
